attributes.action: abandon the food recycling "slop bucket" plan proposed by Hilary Benn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is increasingly becoming a "Big Brother" environment, and now we may be expected to segregate even our food waste or be fined.
This is expensive, potentially unhealthy, due to having to retain rotting food in the home, and is just an example of some MP (Hilary Benn) trying to make a name for himself, rather than ultimately being of any benefit to the economy or the environment.
We, the British people, are tired of these ridiculous dictates and want this plan scrapped immediately.
